title: "Dal Rugby" sports/college slab serif
content:
Spec this sports font?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Slab serif\_NFL Action.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071204124111/http:/typophile.com/files/Slab%20serif_NFL%20Action.jpg) | 96.33 KB |

 [‹ (x) Wonderful but unknown Jugendstil metal type - Vienna {Alexander}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071204124111/http:/typophile.com/node/39098 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) square sans on Burial "Untrue" CD cover - Agency {Akira} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071204124111/http:/typophile.com/node/39700 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Müller

comments.content: I’d say Rockwell Bold or Extra Bold.
I checked. That not it. Thank you for responding.
I am pretty sure that it is. There are stokes added to the characters and the type is curved in the image... but that is Rockwell.
Well, Christopher, that’s a whole new sample!

Still no.

Check the top of the A

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071204124111im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Still_no_4705.jpg)

Huh?  
Eh, I can come up with a whole bunch of slab serifs that are _Definately not_ Rockwell, if you want me to.

I can to, it’s just that I’m in a bit of a rush and was wondering if someone’s memory is better than mine. I find as I get older playing “name that font” gets harder.

But thank you for your help.

I think you may have mixed up the images in the thread. The first image on the top is of a football advert and then you posted another image of this upholstered flag. I am really confused too because you put an orange ’D’ on top of the image that could be a number of typefaces and then you compared the new image with the old image. I am trying to help but I don’t think I can.
Sorry, you were correct. I posted the wrong pic the first time. Its the DAL RUGBY I’m looking for.

There have been similar queries here before. While I’m not sure of the exact ID for this particular face (and it could even be a custom design), I came up with many lookalike fonts by typing “college” in MyFonts’ search window:

[http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=college](http://web.archive.org/web/20071204124111/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=college "http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=college")

Yeah, or check out the suggestions in [this thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20071204124111/http:/www.typophile.com/node/7510). Or [Yearbook](http://web.archive.org/web/20071204124111/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=yearbook).
